DOC.brief_summary: Study of varenicline 2.0 mg/day treatment for 2 weeks with smoking test done in laboratory on Day 8 and a 1 week quit attempt from Day 8-14.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Varencline Effects on Cigarette Smoking Reward and Craving During a Model of Brief Quit Attempt
DOC.criteria: At least 10 cigarettes/day Interest in quitting smoking Willgness to comply with overnight smoking abbstiennce period followed by lab smoking test Pregnancy Axis I psychiatric disorder which require treatment with psychoactive medication and would make study compliance difficult. Clinically significant medical condition in opinion of study clinician Drug or alcohol dependence inlast 12 months Use of other smoking cessation medications ot treatment progams in last 2 months
